description: In this bathroom I'm installing the Schluter shower pan and KERDI-DRAIN. The maximum hole size through plywood is 5 inches. So I'm using Milwaukee's 5-inch hole saw with a starter bit. This also works for toilet closet flange installation. It's the last day to join our Video Library and get our Beginner Walk-In Shower Plumbing course for free at https://homerepairtutor.com/platinum-membership/
title: How to Cut a Hole for KERDI-DRAIN - #shorts #homerepairtutor
